snippet.title: My game that I created called Kill The Dragon Trailer
snippet.description:
Kill The Dragon is a choices matter adventure game. You go in search for the dragon to kill but watch out because there are gruesome deaths ahead!

This game was originally developed inside my other game called NO LOVE. Now it’s available as its own standalone game! I had a lot of fun making it so I hope you have fun playing it.

MUSIC USED:
TRG BANKS

================================================

Kill The Dragon on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1754260/Kill_The_Dragon/

My Games on itch:
https://wallacelovecraft.itch.io/

SUPPORT Me on Patreon:
